description: An Agentic KG for Supply Chain Management and Logistics, designed to optimize supply chain operations through dynamic risk assessment, route optimization, and real‑time monitoring. This KG leverages advanced agent generation to simulate disruptions, suggest contingency plans, and optimize logistics, all while ensuring blockchain‑audited transparency and decentralized governance.

agents.name: BaseLogisticsAgent
agents.description: Extracts and standardizes logistics data from multiple sources for supply chain analysis.
agents.ethics_guidelines: Output must be unbiased, fact-based, and comply with internal ethical standards.

agents.name: RouteOptimizationAgent
agents.description: Optimizes delivery routes based on real‑time traffic, distance, and cost parameters.
agents.ethics_guidelines: Output must be unbiased, fact-based, and comply with internal ethical standards.

agents.name: DisruptionSimulationAgent
agents.description: Simulates supply chain disruptions and assesses potential impacts.
agents.ethics_guidelines: Output must be unbiased, fact-based, and comply with internal ethical standards.

agents.name: DynamicCompositeSCMAgent
agents.description: Dynamically combines outputs from multiple supply chain agents to generate an integrated risk mitigation and optimization strategy.
agents.ethics_guidelines: Output must be unbiased, fact-based, and comply with internal ethical standards.

metadata.notes: This Supply Chain Management KG dynamically optimizes logistics operations, simulates disruptions, and generates integrated risk mitigation strategies. Blockchain‑audited microtransactions and decentralized governance ensure transparent monetization and continuous system improvement.

pricing.dynamicPricing: Based on disruption severity and operational impact

training_examples.input: Simulate a major supply chain disruption due to natural disasters in a key region.
training_examples.expected_output: A detailed contingency plan with alternative sourcing and routing strategies.
training_examples.description: Training example for supply chain disruption simulation.

training_examples.input: Optimize the delivery route for perishable goods under time constraints.
training_examples.expected_output: A route plan that minimizes delivery time and preserves product quality.

evaluation_examples.input: Evaluate the impact of increased transportation costs on overall supply chain efficiency.
evaluation_examples.expected_output: A comprehensive analysis with cost–benefit recommendations.

final_exam_examples.input: Develop a complete supply chain risk mitigation strategy for a multinational retailer facing disruptions, high fuel costs, and regulatory challenges.
final_exam_examples.expected_output: An integrated strategy document covering contingency plans, alternative sourcing, cost optimization, and regulatory compliance.
final_exam_examples.description: Final exam: integrated supply chain strategy.
